doc.name: printPaperSize

syntax.example: set the printPaperSize to width, height

doc.summary: Reports the size of the paper to print to.

examples.example:
if tPaperSize is "A4" then
set the printPaperSize to "595,842"
end if

description.p: Use the printPaperSize to determine or set the size of the paper to print to. This size is the size of the physical paper before any scaling or rotation is applied.
The printPaperSize is specified in points, in the form width,height.
To have an effect, this property must be set before calling open printing.
